org.mini2Dx.core.graphics

Interface NinePatch

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LibgdxNinePatch

    public interface NinePatch

    • Method Detail

      • render

        void render(Graphics g,
            float x,
            float y,
            float width,
            float height)

      • getColor

        Color getColor()

      • setColor

        void setColor(Color color)
        Copy given color. The color will be blended with the batch color, then combined with the texture colors at draw time. Default is White.

      • getLeftWidth

        float getLeftWidth()

      • setLeftWidth

        void setLeftWidth(float leftWidth)
        Set the draw-time width of the three left edge patches

      • getRightWidth

        float getRightWidth()

      • setRightWidth

        void setRightWidth(float rightWidth)
        Set the draw-time width of the three right edge patches

      • getTopHeight

        float getTopHeight()

      • setTopHeight

        void setTopHeight(float topHeight)
        Set the draw-time height of the three top edge patches

      • getBottomHeight

        float getBottomHeight()

      • setBottomHeight

        void setBottomHeight(float bottomHeight)
        Set the draw-time height of the three bottom edge patches

      • getMiddleWidth

        float getMiddleWidth()

      • setMiddleWidth

        void setMiddleWidth(float middleWidth)
        Set the width of the middle column of the patch. At render time, this is implicitly the requested render-width of the entire nine patch, minus the left and right width. This value is only used for computing the default total width.

      • getMiddleHeight

        float getMiddleHeight()

      • setMiddleHeight

        void setMiddleHeight(float middleHeight)
        Set the height of the middle row of the patch. At render time, this is implicitly the requested render-height of the entire nine patch, minus the top and bottom height. This value is only used for computing the default total height.

      • getTotalWidth

        float getTotalWidth()

      • getTotalHeight

        float getTotalHeight()

      • setPadding

        void setPadding(float left,
                float right,
                float top,
                float bottom)
        Set the padding for content inside this ninepatch. By default the padding is set to match the exterior of the ninepatch, so the content should fit exactly within the middle patch.

      • getPaddingLeft

        float getPaddingLeft()
        Returns the left padding if set, else returns getLeftWidth().

      • setPaddingLeft

        void setPaddingLeft(float left)
        See setPadding(float, float, float, float)

      • getPaddingRight

        float getPaddingRight()
        Returns the right padding if set, else returns getRightWidth().

      • setPaddingRight

        void setPaddingRight(float right)
        See setPadding(float, float, float, float)

      • getPaddingTop

        float getPaddingTop()
        Returns the top padding if set, else returns getTopHeight().

      • setPaddingTop

        void setPaddingTop(float top)
        See setPadding(float, float, float, float)

      • getPaddingBottom

        float getPaddingBottom()
        Returns the bottom padding if set, else returns getBottomHeight().

      • setPaddingBottom

        void setPaddingBottom(float bottom)
        See setPadding(float, float, float, float)

      • scale

        void scale(float scaleX,
           float scaleY)

      • getTexture

        Texture getTexture()
